newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy's Milan sees April CPI at 0.3 pct mo/mo.
newsitem.headline: Italy's Milan sees April CPI at 0.3 pct mo/mo.

text.p: The Italian city of Milan said its April consumer price index stood at 0.3 percent month-on-month and 1.8 percent year-on-year.
In March, Milan's inflation rate was 0.0 percent and 2.2 percent respectively.

Milan is one of 11 Italian cities to publish CPI data on Monday and Tuesday. The city's CPI has a weighting of 19.1 percent on the national index. The 11 sample cities have a combined weighting of 75.66 percent on the total index.
